channel.title: Help with Server
channel.description:
Ok so, most people can connect to my server with the downloadable client, but every now and then someone tells me when they run it, it says "Java is not recognized as an internal or external command"... They always tell me they have Java so I don't know what the problem is.
I really need to fix this because I want everyone to be able to connect to my server.

item.title: Help with Server
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:1, topic:431133”]Ok so, most people can connect to my server with the downloadable client, but every now and then someone tells me when they run it, it says “Java is not recognized as an internal or external command”… They always tell me they have Java so I don’t know what the problem is.

I really need to fix this because I want everyone to be able to connect to my server.[/quote]

go to edit run.bat and post your code for that here

Read full topic

thats because they need to edit the java in the run.bat code

item.description:
@Chaotic-Madness wrote:

[quote=“jarrodbaws, post:2, topic:431133”]Ur client might be running a different Java version then they are currently using.
try making a webclient 100x easier less hassle and have dl client for people who it works for.

rep plox??
Hope I Helped.

-Jarrod[/quote]

asking for reps rep- for you
